chain_mining.button.uninstall.hover: Click to uninstall this data pack! (Requires sufficient permission)
chain_mining.message.data_pack.title: Chain Mining Data Pack
chain_mining.message.settings.title: Settings
chain_mining.message.instruction.title: Instructions
chain_mining.message.instruction.main.li: Supports mining all Ores, Logs, Stems, Rocks, and Crops;
If the block has hardness and a tool is used, its durability will be consumed automatically (until tool breaking), but enchantments will take effect;
To avoid triggering a chain mining, you can hold sneaking;
Click the settings below to control the switches for various types of chaining.
chain_mining.message.instruction.overwor: Coal Ore, Copper Ore, Iron Ore, Lapis Lazuli Ore, Redstone Ore, Gold Ore, Diamond Ore, Emerald Ore, and Amethyst Cluster
A proper pickaxe is required to trigger the chain mining.
chain_mining.message.instruction.nether_: Nether Quartz Ore, Nether Gold Ore, Gilded Blackstone, Ancient Debris, and Glowstone
A proper pickaxe is required to trigger the chain mining, except for Glowstone;
Using a tool to mine Glowstone will consume its durability, but the enchantments will take effect.
chain_mining.message.instruction.logs.ho: Oak Log, Spruce Log, Birch Log, Jungle Log, Acacia Log, Dark Oak Log, Mangrove Log, Mangrove Roots, Pale Oak Log, Cherry Log, Crimson Stem, and Warped Stem
chain_mining.message.instruction.logs.li: An axe is required to trigger the chain mining;
If the off-hand holds a hoe, a %s range of corresponding Leaves, Wart Blocks and Shroomlights will also be mined;
Mangrove Roots can be chained together with Mangrove Logs.
chain_mining.message.instruction.rocks.h: Andesite, Diorite, Granite, Tuff, Calcite, Amethyst Block, and Magma Block
chain_mining.message.instruction.rocks.l: A pickaxe is required to trigger the chain mining;
The default setting for this category is OFF! Unless specifically needed, %s turn it on in the settings (it may cause pickaxes to break instantly)
chain_mining.message.instruction.crops_n: Wheat, Carrots, Potatoes, Beetroot, Nether Warts, Sugar Cane, and Sweet Berry Bushes
chain_mining.message.changelog.title: Changelog
chain_mining.message.load_success: Chain Mining Data Pack has been loaded! %s %s %s
chain_mining.setting.loot.hover: When enabled, the drops from chain mining will be automatically teleported to your position.
